naslov: Kuća: Kaštel Sućurac, 360.00 m2, 3 etaže+bazen+kamin, pogled na more (prodaja)
opis: Ekskluzivna prodaja vile u Kaštel Sućurcu, idealna za one koji traže kombinaciju mediteranskog šarma i suvremenog dizajna. Smještena na mirnoj ulici ispod planine Kozjak, ova elegantna vila prostire se na tri etaže s ukupnom stambenom površinom od 360 m2, od čega je podrumka etaža garaža ili game room sa pripadajućim wc-om, na 1 katu se nalazi prostrani 2-sobni stan sa velikom terasom, a na drugom katu 3-sobni stan sa terasom. Iz svakog kutka nekretnine pruža se otvoreni prekrasan pogled na more, grad Split,,Čiovo i Trogir, koji ne može biti nikad zaklonjen jer se parcela kaskadno pruža prema jugu u veličini od 1223 m2. Nova na tržištu, vila nudi prostranih pet spavaćih soba i dvije moderne kupaonice, dizajnirane za maksimalnu udobnost. Raskošan vrt od 1.000m2 kaskadno položen i bazen od 36 m2 omogućuju uživanje u toploj klimi Dalmatinske obale. Dvije garaže s automatskim vratima koje mogu primiti dva automobila, uz dodatna tri vanjska parkirna mjesta, nude obilje prostora za parkiranje. UZ bazen se nalazi nadstrešnica od 19 m2 i vanjski roštilj sa 12-16 sjedaćih mjesta. Vila je u cijelosti namještena i izolirana s dodatkom opeka/cigle i žbuke, pružajući savršenu privatnost. Prostrani unutarnji prostori uključuju blagovaonicu povezanu s kuhinjom, parketne podove, visoke stropove i french doors koje vode na balkon s pogledom na zaljev. Vila je potpuno klimatizirana, s električnim grijanjem, mogućnošću ugradnje kamina i svim potrebnim uređajima uključujući perilicu suđa. Ova prekrasna nekretnina nudi otvorene i prekrasne poglede na planine i more, a nalazi se u blizini plaže, šume, i zračne luke. Idealan je izbor za investiciju ili luksuzni dom uz obalu. Ne propustite priliku posjedovati ovu izvanrednu nekretninu na prestižnoj lokaciji! Vlasništvo uredno, vila ima uporabnu dozvolu i moguća je kupnja kreditom banke. Exclusive luxury villa for sale in Kaštel Sućurac, ideal for those looking for a combination of Mediterranean charm and contemporary design. Located on a quiet street below the Kozjak mountain, this elegant villa spreads over three floors with a total living area of 360 m2, of which the basement is a garage or game room with an attached toilet, on the 1st floor there is a spacious 2-bedroom apartment with a large terrace, and on the second floor there is a 3-bedroom apartment with a terrace. From every corner of the property there is an open, beautiful view of the sea, the city of Split, Čiovo and Trogir, which can never be obscured because the plot cascades to the south in size of 1223 m2. New to the market, the villa offers spacious five bedrooms and two modern bathrooms, designed for maximum comfort. A lush 1,000 m2 cascading garden and a 36 m2 swimming pool allow you to enjoy the warm climate of the Dalmatian coast. Two garages with automatic doors that can accommodate two cars, with an additional three outdoor parking spaces, offer plenty of parking space. Next to the pool there is a 19 m2 carport and an outdoor barbecue with 12-16 seats. The villa is fully furnished and insulated with the addition of bricks/bricks and plaster, providing perfect privacy. The spacious interior spaces include a dining room connected to the kitchen, parquet floors, high ceilings and French doors leading to a balcony overlooking the bay. The villa is fully air-conditioned, with electric heating, the possibility of installing a fireplace and all necessary appliances including a dishwasher. This beautiful property offers open and beautiful views of the mountains and the sea, and is located near the beach, forest, and airport. It is an ideal choice for an investment or a luxury home by the coast. Do not miss the opportunity to own this extraordinary property in a prestigious location! The ownership is neat, the villa has a use permit and it is possible to purchase with a bank loan.
